title: Open Close Cycle Mac 2017
body:
when i open the LoL client, it opens then closes, opens again then closes again
it keeps repeating until i force quit it
btw im on a mac if u didnt realize that from the title

i check connection and this is what it tells me
isp connection: 91
your connection: 0
best isp connection: 91

i reinstalled the client and it was okay...but then i went on another user and i couldnt open it?

EDIT: it's been 17 days from the day i submitted this...nobody's helping me...i reinstalled it and it's worked until today, where it opens, says the old version thing and then asks me to restart the client, and i press it and the patch thing comes up. when it finishes the client reopens and it asks me the old version thing again, it keeps looping until i force quit it. help?

replies.body: Hey there, this might be an issue caused by an unstable connection that can't reach the patching servers and load the client.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help in this case.
it says my connection score is 0...how i fix? thnx btw!

Oof, so it's not getting through at all?  >.<  No worries, definitely make sure to go over each step of that guide.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to auto-configure firewall settings in case that's the culprit.
